channel.title: Just a Wee Little Help
channel.description:
Well ive just started on tutorials to make myself a good server, because i have alot of money for dedi's and other things, but ive only just started, dont flame because everyone has to start off at some point, well ive downloaded the devine pk and read all of the things needed and im done, it loads up and ive tried following the guides to make myself an admin on 'wmap' but for some reason cant find where to make a user a mod/admin,
also, ive followed guides on how to change log in welcome messages, ive changed them in the notepad and nothing changed when i loaded it up again, im going to put the steps i went throught and if someone would be kind enough to guide me in the right if i have done anything wrong.
[b]I AM ALSO WILLING TO PAY SOMEONE THROUGH PAYPAL THAT WILL GIVE ME A TUTORIAL SO MY SERVER IS UP AND RUNNING, YOU CAN NAME THE PRICE, ALSO WILL HAVE TO HAVE PAYPAL.[/b]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/6632/thisthinghu8.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=293&i=thisthinghu8.jpg][IMG]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/6632/thisthinghu8.88765f3834.jpg[/img][/URL]
or if someone would give me a good tutorial on msn? tha_bold_one@hotmail.co.uk

^^ what do you mean nothing loads? Divine pk has some npc’s out of bounds and that it. Server should work fine even with the messed npc’s

item.title: Just a Wee Little Help
item.dc:creator: @dumm1s dumm1s
item.description:
@dumm1s wrote:

make sure WAMP is running,
ctrl + alt + del and terminate all running java processes.

check your messages.

Read full topic

Well ive just started on tutorials to make myself a good server, because i have alot of money for dedi’s and other things, but ive only just started, dont flame because everyone has to start off at some point,
